main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were observed over Okinawa on 6 November 1954.
interesting points: The sightings occurred at approximately 1630 hours local time., Witnesses included USAF, USMC personnel, and government personnel from the Ryukyu Islands., Objects were described as oval in shape and approximately 20 to 30 feet in diameter., Some objects changed shape and color during the observation., The sightings lasted between 20 to 45 seconds depending on the observer.
witness description: USAF and USMC personnel, and a civilian military employee
